Question
========
When Positron asks whether you trust the authors of a newly opened folder, what should you generally do?

Answerlist
----------
* Only trust the folder if you know and trust the source; otherwise review before allowing
* Always trust every folder to avoid prompts
* Never trust any folder, even your own projects
* Delete the folder to avoid the decision

Solution
========
Trust prompts help prevent malicious code from running; you should only trust folders from sources you know and review unfamiliar ones before allowing.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
